CustomField.description: This was created as a part of HWSDDP-29
CustomField.formula:
IF( ($Profile.Name == 'Customers' || $Profile.Name == 'PRM Partner Community User Login' || $Profile.Name == 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' || $Profile.Name == 'Customers Login') ,HYPERLINK("/support/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file="+HWS_AttachmentId__c, CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'HWS_Damaged_Part_Quote', HWS_AttachmentName__c , 'HWS_UnReturned_Part_Quote', HWS_AttachmentName__c, Id)),
HYPERLINK("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file="+HWS_AttachmentId__c, CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName,'HWS_Damaged_Part_Quote', HWS_AttachmentName__c , 'HWS_UnReturned_Part_Quote', HWS_AttachmentName__c, Id),"_self") )
CustomField.label: Quote document
